sub_title: experienced project manager; looking for new opportunities now
summary:
Twenty years of international experience in PFM consultancy in > 30 developing economies with a strong focus on government revenue, at the national and sub-national level of government.

Specialisations: Tax Administration (all round), Tax Policy (all round), Non-Tax Revenue, Tax Dispute Resolution, Local Government Revenue, Public Finance, Fiscal Analysis, Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability (PEFA), Project Management, Project Evaluation (ex ante and ex post), Development Economics, Economics Education, Statistics, Survey and Census Methodology.
You may contact me at de_zeeuwm@hotmail.com or Skype maarten.de.zeeuw.

projects:
[{'title': 'Lot 11 - Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability (PEFA) Assessment Update for Moldova (2012-2014)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'EU Delegation of Moldova
The objective of the assessment is to draft a comprehensive Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability, 2012-2014 - Performance Report (PEFA-PR) prepared according to the PEFA methodology4, so as to provide a repeated analysis of the overall performance of the PFM systems of the Republic of Moldova as well as an updated situation that permits the measuring over time of the changes in performance.
In addition, besides the PEFA assessment (using the 2011 Framework) to evaluate nine selected indicators from the Upgraded PEFA methodology 2015 (testing version, January 2015).

I was responsible for payments and accounts.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1986}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'role': 'Chess author and analyst', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Various publications', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': 'I co-authored four books, mostly in Dutch:
1) (with M. Ploeger): 40 jaar topschaak 1900-1940, Van Spijk, Venlo, 1986;
2) (with M. Ploeger): Zó schaakt de Europese jeugd (European Junior Chess Championship 1988), Van Spijk, Venlo, 1988;
3) (with G. den Broeder, F. van der Vliet): Volmac Chess Tournament. Europe Cup Finals 1988, Magnana Mu Publishing, Rotterdam, 1988;
4) (with A. Münninghoff): Hein Donner 1927-1988, Scheffers, Utrecht, 1994, especially pp. 164-181.

Furthermore I published about 30 analytical articles, often in cooperation with International Grandmaster Roberto Cifuentes, for international top publications including New In Chess, in English and Spanish. Subjects covered were endgame theory, middlegame theory, opening theory, tournament reports, and biography and history.
